casebody.data:
PORTEOUS v. REED. No. 9967; September 16, 1886. 12 Pac. 117. Statute of Limitations.—Failure to Find upon the Issue of the Statute of limitations is ground for reversal of the judgment. APPEAL from Superior Court, County of Calaveras.

Ira H. Reed and D. M. Seaton for appellant; Reddick & Solinsky for respondent.

Per CURIAM.

Ejectment. The defendants pleaded the statute of limitations. The findings fail to respond to this issue. The judgment is reversed and cause remanded.
